member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.GetTaskInformation
member.summary: Gets all the Task Information records.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.response: Returns if the no Task Records are found.

member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.GetTaskInformationByID(System.Guid)
member.summary: Gets a single Task Information record by ID.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.response: Returns if the no Task Records are found.

member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.GetTaskInformationByUserName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all the Task Information records by User Name.
member.param: The Task Information record User Name.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.response: Returns if the no Task Records are found.

member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.AddTaskInformation(EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Models.DTO.TaskInformationPostDto)
member.summary: Adds a Task Information record.
member.param: The request body for the operation.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /TaskInformation { UserName: "Dave Brett" TaskName: "Task 1" TaskState: 0 }

member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.UpdateTaskInformation(System.Guid,EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Models.DTO.TaskInformationPostDto)
member.summary: Updates a Task Information record.
member.param: The request body for the operation.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.response: Returns the updated Task Information record.
Returns if the Task Record does not exist.

member.name: M:EUC.Profile.Buddy.Web.Api.Controllers.TaskInformationController.DeleteTaskInformation(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a Task Information record.
member.returns: A representing the result of the asynchronous operation.
member.response: Returns the deleted Task Information ID.
Returns if the Task Record does not exist.
